description.en: Video game music online radio, including remixes and original soundtracks! Vote for the songs you want to hear!
description.zh_CN: 电子游戏音乐在线广播，包括混音和原声带！ 为您想听的歌曲投票！
description.nl: Videogamemuziek online radio, inclusief remixen en originele soundtracks! Stem op de liedjes die je wilt horen!
